subject: RE: [junit] Training that focuses on unit testing?
msgSnippet: ... I got my religion from Mike Clark.  He trained my team about 3 years ago in TDD and JUnit, and I highly recommend him.  However, I think he s doing more
messageBody:
> I am looking for some training for my team in effective unit testing.
> I have found a few through google searches. Does anyone
> have any first hand knowledge they can share?

I got my religion from Mike Clark. He trained my team about 3 years ago
in TDD and JUnit, and I highly recommend him. However, I think he's
doing more Ruby than Java these days, so I don't know if he still
teaches his excellent TDD workshop.


Todd.
